alert.note: Alert for Campbell (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 4:31PM MDT until June 23 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Campbell County in northeastern Wyoming... * Until 515 PM MDT. * At 430 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 19 miles northwest of Spotted Horse to 5 miles northeast of Echeta to 13 miles north of Savageton, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gillette, Camplex Event Facility, Weston and Rozet. This includes Interstate 90 in Wyoming between Mile Markers 97 and 147. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for northeastern Wyoming.
